item.title: CASM: A Cost-Aware Switch Migration Strategy for Elastic Optical Inter-Datacenter Networks
item.description: 摘要In inter-datacenter elastic optical networks, multi-controller deployment is adopted to improve the stability and scalability of the control plane. As the network scale increases, the traditional multi-controller deployment scheme ignores the dynamic characteristics of traffic, resulting in unbalanced load among multiple controllers.
